The crie of the poore for the death of the Right Honourable Earle of Huntington To the tune of the Earle of Bedford.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
For VVilliam Blackvvall, and are to be sold at his shoppe nere Guild-Hall gate, Printed at London : 1596.
A ballad. Verse: O God of thy mercie remember the poore, .. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
